name: Geb
description: Geb is the guardian of earth and nature. His rocky form is draped in lush vegetation, a microcosm of the natural world.

skills.name: Unstoppable
skills.description: Geb enters the [Boulder] state, gaining a shield equal to 30% of his max HP. He then rolls forward, continuously knocking back enemies in front and dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per hit to 115% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases shield strength to 40% of max HP.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per hit to 130% of ATK.

skills.name: Stone Armor
skills.description: Geb grants himself a shield equal to 15% of max HP, lasting up to 6s.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increases to 20% of max HP.
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 25% of max HP.

skills.name: Heart of the Earth
skills.description: Geb has rocky skin. The closer an enemy is to Geb, the less DMG they deal to him, with a maximum reduction of 30%.

upgrades.level4: Reduces the ATK SPD of nearby enemies by 25%.

skills.name: Natureâ€™s Wrath
skills.description: Geb strikes nearby enemies 3 times, each hit dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK. The last hit knocks down enemies.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Reduces the Hit Rate of hit enemies by 30% for 5s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 120% of ATK.

relic.name: Earthshaker
relic.description: When shielded, Geb deals DMG equal to 5% of his max HP to the attacker each time he takes DMG.

upgrades.level2: Geb gains a shield equal to 30% of max HP at combat start.
upgrades.level3: Gains 300 Energy when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Geb gains a shield equal to 50% of max HP at combat start.
